title: Dead Sexy
description: From the author of Tall, Dark & Dead , the second in the paranormal series featuring "a gem of a heroine" (Mary Janice Davidson).Tall, Dark & Dead introduced Garnet Lacey, a bookstore manager/witch who accidentally unleashed the dark goddess Lilith on Vatican assassins. Now she has other things to worry about-like pesky frat boy zombies, a gorgeous FBI agent hot on her trail, love spells gone wrong, and keeping her vampire boyfriend a safe distance from her vampire ex-boyfriend. There's just no rest for this Wiccan...
author: Tate Hallaway
